verses.verse: וַיִּקְח֣וּ <WH3947> way·yiq·ḥū took בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> ḇə·nê- sons ( The Sin of Nadab and Abihu) ( 40 3:1-4) אַ֠הֲרֹן 175 N-proper-ms ( ’a·hă·rōn) Now Aaron’s נָדָ֨ב 5070 N-proper-ms ( nā·ḏāḇ) Nadab וַאֲבִיה֜וּא 30 Conj-w│N-proper-ms ( wa·’ă·ḇî·hū) and Abihu אִ֣ישׁ 376 N-ms ( ’îš) - מַחְתָּת֗וֹ 4289 N-fsc│3ms ( maḥ·tā·ṯōw) their censers, וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ 5414 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3mp ( way·yit·tə·nū) put בָהֵן֙ Prep-b│Pro-3fp ( ḇā·hên) in them אֵ֔שׁ 784 N-cs ( ’êš) fire וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ 7760 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3mp ( way·yā·śî·mū) and added עָלֶ֖יהָ 5921 Prep│3fs ( ‘ā·le·hā) -, קְטֹ֑רֶת 7004 N-fs ( qə·ṭō·reṯ) incense וַיַּקְרִ֜בוּ 7126 Conj-w│V-Hifil-ConsecImperf-3mp ( way·yaq·ri·ḇū) and offered לִפְנֵ֤י 6440 Prep-l│N-cpc ( lip̄·nê) before יְהוָה֙ 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) the LORD, אֵ֣שׁ 784 N-cs ( ’êš) fire זָרָ֔ה 2114 Adj-fs ( zā·rāh) unauthorized אֲשֶׁ֧ר 834 Pro-r ( ’ă·šer) - לֹ֦א 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō) contrary to צִוָּ֖ה 6680 V-Piel-Perf-3ms ( ṣiw·wāh) His command אֹתָֽם׃ 853 DirObjM│3mp ( ’ō·ṯām) -.

וַתֵּ֥צֵא <WH3318> wat·tê·ṣê came out אֵ֛שׁ <WH784> ’êš So fire מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> mil·lip̄·nê from the presence יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD וַתֹּ֣אכַל <WH398> wat·tō·ḵal and consumed אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> ’ō·w·ṯām them, וַיָּמֻ֖תוּ <WH4191> way·yā·mu·ṯū and they died לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lip̄·nê in the presence of יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD.

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> mō·šeh Then Moses אֶֽל־ <WH413> ’el- to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> ’a·hă·rōn Aaron, הוּא֩ <WH1931> hū “ This אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> ’ă·šer- is what דִּבֶּ֨ר <WH1696> dib·ber meant יְהוָ֤ה׀ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD לֵאמֹר֙ <WH559> lê·mōr when He said: בִּקְרֹבַ֣י <WH7138> biq·rō·ḇay ‘ To those who come near Me אֶקָּדֵ֔שׁ <WH6942> ’eq·qā·ḏêš I will show My holiness, וְעַל־ <WH5921> wə·‘al- and in פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pə·nê the sight of כָל־ <WH3605> ḵāl all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> hā·‘ām the people אֶכָּבֵ֑ד <WH3513> ’ek·kā·ḇêḏ I will reveal My glory. ’” וַיִּדֹּ֖ם <WH1826> way·yid·dōm remained silent. אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> ’a·hă·rōn But Aaron

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> way·yiq·rā summoned מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- מִֽישָׁאֵל֙ <WH4332> mî·šā·’êl Mishael וְאֶ֣ל <WH413> wə·’el - אֶלְצָפָ֔ן <WH469> ’el·ṣā·p̄ān and Elzaphan, ( Elzaphan is a variant of Elizaphan; see .) בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> bə·nê sons עֻזִּיאֵ֖ל <WH5816> ‘uz·zî·’êl Uzziel, דֹּ֣ד <WH1730> dōḏ uncle אַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> ’a·hă·rōn of Aaron’s וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer and said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> ’ă·lê·hem to them, קִ֠רְב֞וּ <WH7126> qir·ḇū “ Come here; שְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> śə·’ū carry אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - אֲחֵיכֶם֙ <WH251> ’ă·ḥê·ḵem the bodies of your cousins מֵאֵ֣ת <WH854> mê·’êṯ - פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> pə·nê- away from the front הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> haq·qō·ḏeš of the sanctuary אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- .... ” מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> mi·ḥūṣ outside לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> lam·ma·ḥă·neh the camp,

וַֽיִּקְרְב֗וּ <WH7126> way·yiq·rə·ḇū So they came forward וַיִּשָּׂאֻם֙ <WH5375> way·yiś·śā·’um and carried them, בְּכֻתֳּנֹתָ֔ם <WH3801> bə·ḵut·to·nō·ṯām still in their tunics, אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- ... מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> mi·ḥūṣ outside לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> lam·ma·ḥă·neh the camp, כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ka·’ă·šer as דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib·ber had directed. מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> mō·šeh Then Moses אֶֽל־ <WH413> ’el- to אַהֲרֹ֡ן <WH175> ’a·hă·rōn Aaron וּלְאֶלְעָזָר֩ <WH499> ū·lə·’el·‘ā·zār Eleazar וּלְאִֽיתָמָ֨ר׀ <WH385> ū·lə·’î·ṯā·mār and Ithamar, בָּנָ֜יו <WH1121> bā·nāw and his sons רָֽאשֵׁיכֶ֥ם <WH7218> rā·šê·ḵem let your hair אַל־ <WH408> ’al- “ Do not תִּפְרָ֣עוּ׀ <WH6544> tip̄·rā·‘ū become disheveled ( Or Do not uncover your heads) וּבִגְדֵיכֶ֤ם <WH899> ū·ḇiḡ·ḏê·ḵem your garments, לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lō- and do not תִפְרֹ֙מוּ֙ <WH6533> ṯip̄·rō·mū tear וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> wə·lō or else תָמֻ֔תוּ <WH4191> ṯā·mu·ṯū you will die, וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> wə·‘al with כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- the whole הָעֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> hā·‘ê·ḏāh congregation. יִקְצֹ֑ף <WH7107> yiq·ṣōp̄ and the LORD will be angry וַאֲחֵיכֶם֙ <WH251> wa·’ă·ḥê·ḵem But your brothers, כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- the whole בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> bêṯ house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of Israel, יִבְכּוּ֙ <WH1058> yiḇ·kū may mourn [on account of] אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַשְּׂרֵפָ֔ה <WH8316> haś·śə·rê·p̄āh the fire אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> ’ă·šer that שָׂרַ֥ף <WH8313> śā·rap̄ has ignited. יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD

וּמִפֶּתַח֩ <WH6607> ū·mip·pe·ṯaḥ the entrance אֹ֨הֶל <WH168> ’ō·hel to the Tent מוֹעֵ֜ד <WH4150> mō·w·‘êḏ of Meeting, לֹ֤א <WH3808> lō You shall not תֵֽצְאוּ֙ <WH3318> ṯê·ṣə·’ū go outside פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- or תָּמֻ֔תוּ <WH4191> tā·mu·ṯū you will die, כִּי־ <WH3588> kî- for שֶׁ֛מֶן <WH8081> še·men oil מִשְׁחַ֥ת <WH4888> miš·ḥaṯ anointing יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD’s עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5921> ‘ă·lê·ḵem is on you. ” וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> way·ya·‘ă·śū So they did כִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> kiḏ·ḇar instructed. מֹשֶֽׁה׃פ <WH4872> mō·šeh as Moses
וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> way·ḏab·bêr said ( Restrictions for Priests) יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh Then the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> ’el- to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> ’a·hă·rōn Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> lê·mōr ...,

יַ֣יִן <WH3196> ya·yin wine וְשֵׁכָ֞ר <WH7941> wə·šê·ḵār or strong drink אַל־ <WH408> ’al- are not תֵּ֣שְׁתְּ׀ <WH8354> tê·šət to drink אַתָּ֣ה׀ <WH859> ’at·tāh “ You וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <WH1121> ū·ḇā·ne·ḵā and your sons אִתָּ֗ךְ <WH854> ’it·tāḵ ... בְּבֹאֲכֶ֛ם <WH935> bə·ḇō·’ă·ḵem when you enter אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- ... אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> ’ō·hel the Tent מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> mō·w·‘êḏ of Meeting, וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> wə·lō or else תָמֻ֑תוּ <WH4191> ṯā·mu·ṯū you will die; חֻקַּ֥ת <WH2708> ḥuq·qaṯ statute עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> ‘ō·w·lām this is a permanent לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1755> lə·ḏō·rō·ṯê·ḵem for the generations to come.

וּֽלֲהַבְדִּ֔יל <WH914> ū·lă·haḇ·dîl You must distinguish בֵּ֥ין <WH996> bên between הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> haq·qō·ḏeš the holy וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> ū·ḇên ... הַחֹ֑ל <WH2455> ha·ḥōl and the common, וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> ū·ḇên between הַטָּמֵ֖א <WH2931> haṭ·ṭā·mê and the unclean וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> ū·ḇên ..., הַטָּהֽוֹר׃ <WH2889> haṭ·ṭā·hō·wr the clean

וּלְהוֹרֹ֖ת <WH3384> ū·lə·hō·w·rōṯ so that you may teach אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> bə·nê the Israelites יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl ... אֵ֚ת <WH853> ’êṯ - כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- all הַ֣חֻקִּ֔ים <WH2706> ha·ḥuq·qîm the statutes אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> ’ă·šer that דִּבֶּ֧ר <WH1696> dib·ber has given יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> ’ă·lê·hem them בְּיַד־ <WH3027> bə·yaḏ- through מֹשֶֽׁה׃פ <WH4872> mō·šeh Moses. ”

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> way·ḏab·bêr said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> mō·šeh And Moses אֶֽל־ <WH413> ’el- to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> ’a·hă·rōn Aaron וְאֶ֣ל <WH413> wə·’el ... אֶ֠לְעָזָר <WH499> ’el·‘ā·zār Eleazar וְאֶל־ <WH413> wə·’el- ... אִ֨יתָמָ֥ר׀ <WH385> ’î·ṯā·mār and Ithamar, בָּנָיו֮ <WH1121> bā·nāw sons, הַנּֽוֹתָרִים֒ <WH3498> han·nō·w·ṯā·rîm and his remaining קְח֣וּ <WH3947> qə·ḥū “ Take אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - הַמִּנְחָ֗ה <WH4503> ham·min·ḥāh the grain offering הַנּוֹתֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH3498> han·nō·w·ṯe·reṯ that remains מֵאִשֵּׁ֣י <WH801> mê·’iš·šê from the offerings made by fire יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD וְאִכְל֥וּהָ <WH398> wə·’iḵ·lū·hā and eat it מַצּ֖וֹת <WH4682> maṣ·ṣō·wṯ without leaven אֵ֣צֶל <WH681> ’ê·ṣel beside הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> ham·miz·bê·aḥ the altar, כִּ֛י <WH3588> kî because קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> qō·ḏeš most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> qā·ḏā·šîm holy. הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> hî it [is]

וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֤ם <WH398> wa·’ă·ḵal·tem You shall eat אֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> ’ō·ṯāh - בְּמָק֣וֹם <WH4725> bə·mā·qō·wm place, קָדֹ֔שׁ <WH6918> qā·ḏōš it in a holy כִּ֣י <WH3588> kî because חָקְךָ֤ <WH2706> ḥā·qə·ḵā is your share וְחָק־ <WH2706> wə·ḥāq- ... בָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1121> bā·ne·ḵā and your sons’ share הִ֔וא <WH1931> hî it מֵאִשֵּׁ֖י <WH801> mê·’iš·šê of the offerings made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD; כִּי־ <WH3588> kî- for כֵ֖ן <WH3651> ḵên this is what צֻוֵּֽיתִי׃ <WH6680> ṣuw·wê·ṯî I have been commanded.
